title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - A32nx - Ensure managed heading mode continues to work after the SID
description:
In this video we will have a look what is causing the auto pilot to switch off the managed heading mode after you passed the last waypoint of a Standard Instrumental Departure route. We will start recording just after we bypassed the last waypoint of the SID and explain why it switches of the managed heading mode but also how to enable it again.

If you would like to give the addon a try yourself visit the site below to download it:
https://flybywiresim.com/
